```{r setup, include=FALSE}
#load libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(googlesheets4)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
library(readxl)
library(MuMIn)
library(MASS)
library(pscl)
library(ggokabeito)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```
```{r import}
tickfat_data <- read_excel("../data/tickfat_data.xlsx", 
    sheet = "Experiment_2")
View(tickfat_data)
```
```{r data calculations}
df <- tickfat_data |>
  mutate(
    body_fat = pre_wt-post_wt,
    pct_bf = 1-(post_wt/pre_wt)
    )
```
```{r boxplots}
bplot <- df |>
  ggplot(
    aes(x=week, y = body_fat, group = week)
  ) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(fill = sex)) +
  labs(
    title = "body fat (mg)",
    x = "treatment", y = "body fat (mg)",
  ) +
  facet_wrap(~sex)
bplot

bplot2 <- df |>
    group_by(week) |>
  ggplot(
    aes(x=as.factor(week), y = pct_bf, fill = sex)
  ) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(
    title = "body fat (pct)",
    x = "treatment", y = "body fat (pct)",
  ) +
  facet_wrap(~tx)
bplot2
```
